website_summaries.verdict: A high-end option admired for its sleek design and sturdy construction, this floor rack will add class to any billiard collection.
pros: Solid, high-quality wood with a rich, dark finish
Its narrow design keeps it from taking up too much space, yet there is ample room to hold any extra accessories
Customers rave about the product's easy assembly
cons: Some buyers wish it was a bit larger
Drink holders are a little small

customer_reviews.title: Particle board junk and I was shipped one somebody else had already returned for damage
customer_reviews.text: So, first off, this rack is really cheaply made. Description says "Handcrafted from solid hardwood" but it's particle board with cheap veneer. It's poorly packaged and heavy, so it was damaged when WalMart shipped it to the previous buyer. She returned it, manufacturer then apparently sent it to Amazon without inspecting for damage - so my time is wasted returning a damaged unit. The old invoice was still in the box, hi L***** B**** from Carrolton Tx, lucky you only paid $88.99 when I paid Amazon $100.97 and they shipped me your reject. Yep, I'm not a happy Amazon customer today.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great for our space
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for. It's small and the color is as pictured. We wanted something nice but small for our playroom pool table and this is just what we wanted. Looks nice quality and sturdy without overwhelming the space. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rllehman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rack! My father loved it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Rack! My father loved it. It's narrow, so it doesn't take up much space. My mother didn't want anything hanging on the wall - this was a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Slick50

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but parts missing
customer_reviews.text: There was no included Allen wrench and one of the screw wholes didn't have an insert and I was sent wrong color. The color was fine because I actually wanted it but it cost more. My husband just glued the part of the leg with the messed up imsert and it is fine although I shouldn't have had to do that.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: A good looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in about 10 minutes. Very nice, dark, rich finish. Solid wood, sturdy, and blends well with my game room décor. Once assembled, looks much more expensive than its purchase price. I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and he loves it! Easy to assemble, good quality, looks like picture!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great pool stick holder.  Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly and looks great. It even comes with wooded notches to cover up the screw holes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AE1985

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Simple, inexpensive, quality elegant solution. It took me 10 minutes to put together. Very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already damaged in box
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Very easy to assemble. Looks great except some pieces came already damaged (pics attached). Probably would have happened eventually since it’s particle board, and should be an easy fix with a wood stain pen but disappointed it came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S

customer_reviews.title: The item appears to be of decent quality and it went together very easily. It is exactly as I anticipated it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Everything was included in the package, including the wrench to assemble. The item appears to be of decent quality and it went together very easily. It is exactly as I anticipated it.
customer_reviews.author: Bhuettl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the $$$. Holds all accessories nice and neat in a small profile.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily and seems well made. Husband very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color and is nice and sturdy for all my sticks but was missing the hook piece (P4) and now I have to hold my triangle somewhere else and that annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: John Tully

customer_reviews.title: Classy Pool Cue Rack
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks great. Do not buy if you have low ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: mracquire

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: decent quality and very easy to assemble. wish it were slightly larger though
customer_reviews.author: MikeJizz

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I love it and it is just the right size for my space.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but hook for holding ball racks ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but hook for holding ball racks needs bigger screws, this fell off just after placing the ball racks on it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This item is about as expected .... moderately flimsy Chinese made, does the job furniture. Biggest problem, the directions showed the legs upside down, which did lead to some issues. I put the screws in, then had to remove them and because of the cheap particle board, one screw stripped out the hole. Had to repair it with glue. All in all, it is an ok piece, but don't expect much and you won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: mistergreen

product_meta.title: Hathaway Classic Floor Billiard Pool Cue Rack
product_meta.description: Keep your billiard playing accessories organized and close to the table. The Classic floor free standing billiard accessory storage rack features convenient built-in drink holders. Excellent storage for up to ten cues, chalk, table brush and a full set of billiard balls. A perfect solution for all of your billiard storage needs. Available in Antique Walnut or Rich Mahogany finish 180-day Limited Warranty.
feature_bullets: 4 built-in drink holders to keep you refreshed during your game
Holds up to 10 pool cues and a complete set of billiard balls (cues and balls not included)
Available in 2 beautiful furniture finishes - Antique Walnut or Rich Mahogany
